algorithms.bisim
Class Bisimulation

java.lang.Object
  algorithms.bisim.Bisimulation

public abstract class Bisimulation
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the algorithm BisimH (Bisimulation.refinePartitions), and a modified version of the algorithm kTail (Bisimulation.mergePartitions) that considers state labels instead of state transitions. It is based on the code from Clemens Hammacher's implementation of a partition refinement algorithm for bisimulation minimization. Source: https://ccs.hammacher.name Licence: Eclipse Public License v1.0.

kReduce

                           int k)

Parameters:
